recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM OPINION AND ORDER re: 84 LETTER MOTION for Oral Argument addressed to Judge Paul G. Gardephe from Christopher Viapiano dated June 28, 2019. filed by J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, JP Morgan Chase Bank, N.A., 86 LETTER MOTION for Oral Argument addressed to Judge Paul G. Gardephe from David H. Wollmuth dated June 28, 2019. filed by Marc S. Kirschner,, 76 MOTION to Dismiss Complaint. filed by J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, JP Morgan Chase Bank, N.A., 114 MOTION for Leave to File Amended Complaint . filed by Marc S. Kirschner,, 62 MOTION to File Amicus Brief . filed by Loan Syndications and Trading Association. For the reasons stated herein, Defendants' motion to dismiss (Dkt. No. 76) is granted. Plaintiff's motion for leave to amend (Dkt. No. 114) is denied. The motion for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae, submitted by the Loan Syndications and Trading Association and Bank Policy Institute (Dkt. No. 62), is denied. The parties' motions for oral argument (Dkt. Nos. 84, 86) are denied. Plaintiff will file any motion for leave to amend by June 5, 2020. The Clerk of Court is directed to terminate the motions (Dkt. Nos. 62, 76, 84, 86, 114). SO ORDERED. (Motions due by 6/5/2020.) (Signed by Judge Paul G. Gardephe on 5/22/2020) (jca) (Entered: 05/22/2020)
